chunk:
Excuse My Frank Intense Moisturizing Cream

Brand: Excuse My Frank

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER(AQUA), GLYCERIN, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DISTEARATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CHLORPHENESIN, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, PANTHENOL,

GLYCERYL STEARATE, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CHLORPHENESIN, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, PANTHENOL, PUNICA GRANATUM EXTRACT, GARCINIA MANGOSTANA PEEL EXTRACT, CLITORIA TERNATEA FLOWER EXTRACT
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
